Package com.xebisco.yield.physics

Class RectangleCollider

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
com.xebisco.yield.physics.Collider
com.xebisco.yield.physics.RectangleCollider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behavior, DefaultAxis, Disposable, Renderable
public class RectangleCollider extends Collider
This is a Java class for a rectangle collider that extends a Collider class and includes properties for size, centroid, center, and angle.

    • getShape

      public org.jbox2d.collision.shapes.Shape getShape()
      Description copied from class: Collider
      This function returns a Shape object and is declared as abstract. This shape will be used in PhysicsBodies when creating its bodies fixtures in Box2D.
      Specified by:
      getShape in class Collider
      Returns:
      An abstract Shape object is being returned.

      public void setCentroid(Vector2D centroid)
      This function sets the centroid of the rectangle collider.
      Parameters:
      centroid - The parameter "centroid" is a Vector2D object that represents the center point of the rectangle collider. The method "setCentroid" sets the value of the centroid for the current object to the specified value.
